attributes.action: Impose requirements on schools to shorten the length of the school day to 4hours
attributes.additional_details: Countries such as Finland, where 93% of students end up graduating further education, have done it. By shortening the school days, students wouldn't be as stressed about going to school and their grades could be higher. Fewer school hours per day would permit students to have enough time to study, complete school assignments, participate in after-school activities and be able to get to bed by a decent hour.Teachers can provide more 1-on-1 time with each student in their classroom, allowing for specific weaknesses to be personally addressed and also complete and mark students work which would release pressure of them which is known to help performance.
attributes.background: Make the department of education impose restrictions on schools to Shorten the length of a school day to of 4hours a day or less.
